skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: american band
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Get ready to live out your wildest rockstar dreams in RockBand Tycoon, the online rockstar simulation game unlike any other! With players from all around the world, you'll have the chance to transform your garage band into a world-renowned sensation in just 30 days.

Starting out with just 500 band bucks, a handful of fans, and 24 hours of energy per day, you'll need to hustle to make it big. Whether you're writing songs, playing gigs, marketing your band, or practicing your skills, every move you make will count towards your success.

But it's not just about making money - it's about making a name for yourself. With every hit song you write, every gig you play, and every fan you gain, you'll climb up the charts on rockbandtycoon.io and become a household name in the world of music.

And as your band grows, so too will your options. Hire new managers, buy status symbols, and explore new avenues for success. But be careful - every decision you make will have consequences, and time is always running out.

So what are you waiting for? Grab your guitar, turn up the volume, and get ready to rock and roll in Rock Band Tycoon!
priv:
